headline: Roth MKM Maintains a Buy Rating on Take-Two Interactive (TTWO)
summary: In a report released on May 19, Eric Handler from Roth MKM maintained a Buy rating on Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTWO), with a price target of $265.00. The rating update came after the company reported its fiscal Q4 2025 earnings on May 16. Analysts are bullish on Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTWO) because of […]
